languages.text: Вистенца проводит масштабный ритуал, и новый урожай превосходит любые ожидания. В то же время волна чудовищных мутаций сводит с ума все живое, из-за чего несколько поселений и агрокомплексов оказываются потеряны.

Lady Vyatt performs a great ritual, and the new harvest surpasses all expectations. Meanwhile, a sudden wave of horrific mutations robs all afflicted living things of sanity, and the planet loses several settlements and agri-complexes as a result.
languages.original_text: Вистенца проводит масштабный ритуал, и новый урожай превосходит любые ожидания. В то же время волна чудовищных мутаций сводит с ума все живое, из-за чего несколько поселений и агрокомплексов оказываются потеряны.

traits.locale_text: Lady Vyatt performs a great ritual, and the new harvest surpasses all expectations. Meanwhile, a sudden wave of horrific mutations robs all afflicted living things of sanity, and the planet loses several settlements and agri-complexes as a result.
Utilising your donations, Vistenza conducts an even larger ritual: the harvest triples in size.

Lady Vyatt performs a great ritual, and the new harvest surpasses all expectations. Meanwhile, a sudden wave of horrific mutations robs all afflicted living things of sanity, and the planet loses several settlements and agri-complexes as a result.

languages.text: Dame Vyatt organise un grand rituel, et la nouvelle récolte dépasse toutes les attentes. Pour autant, une vague soudaine de mutations effroyables frappe de folie toutes les créatures vivantes touchées, si bien que la planète perd plusieurs colonies et agri-complexes.
languages.original_text: Lady Vyatt performs a great ritual, and the new harvest surpasses all expectations. Meanwhile, a sudden wave of horrific mutations robs all afflicted living things of sanity, and the planet loses several settlements and agri-complexes as a result.

traits.locale_text: Dame Vyatt organise un grand rituel, et la nouvelle récolte dépasse toutes les attentes. Pour autant, une vague soudaine de mutations effroyables frappe de folie toutes les créatures vivantes touchées, si bien que la planète perd plusieurs colonies et agri-complexes.

languages.text: レディ・ビャットは大規模な儀式を執り行い、人々の期待を上回る収穫がもたらされた。その一方で、突如として出現した恐るべき突然変異の波が、すべての生物から正気を奪い、その結果、惑星はいくつもの集落や農業団地を失った。
languages.original_text: Lady Vyatt performs a great ritual, and the new harvest surpasses all expectations. Meanwhile, a sudden wave of horrific mutations robs all afflicted living things of sanity, and the planet loses several settlements and agri-complexes as a result.

traits.locale_text: レディ・ビャットは大規模な儀式を執り行い、人々の期待を上回る収穫がもたらされた。その一方で、突如として出現した恐るべき突然変異の波が、すべての生物から正気を奪い、その結果、惑星はいくつもの集落や農業団地を失った。

languages.text: 维亚特女士举行了强大的仪式，最近这场收获的农业产量超出了所有人的预期。但与此同时，这颗行星也发生了可怕的突变，许多人在变异的折磨之下发了疯，部分定居点与数座综合农业也在突变期间陷落。
languages.original_text: Lady Vyatt performs a great ritual, and the new harvest surpasses all expectations. Meanwhile, a sudden wave of horrific mutations robs all afflicted living things of sanity, and the planet loses several settlements and agri-complexes as a result.

traits.locale_text: 维亚特女士举行了强大的仪式，最近这场收获的农业产量超出了所有人的预期。但与此同时，这颗行星也发生了可怕的突变，许多人在变异的折磨之下发了疯，部分定居点与数座综合农业也在突变期间陷落。

languages.text: Lady Vyatt celebra un gran ritual y la nueva cosecha supera toda expectativa. Mientras, una oleada de mutaciones espantosas priva a todo ser vivo de la cordura, acabando con numerosos asentamientos y complejos agrícolas por todo el planeta.
languages.original_text: Lady Vyatt performs a great ritual, and the new harvest surpasses all expectations. Meanwhile, a sudden wave of horrific mutations robs all afflicted living things of sanity, and the planet loses several settlements and agri-complexes as a result.

traits.locale_text: Lady Vyatt celebra un gran ritual y la nueva cosecha supera toda expectativa. Mientras, una oleada de mutaciones espantosas priva a todo ser vivo de la cordura, acabando con numerosos asentamientos y complejos agrícolas por todo el planeta.

languages.text: Lady Vyatt führt ein großes Ritual durch, und die neue Ernte übertrifft alle Erwartungen. Währenddessen treibt eine Welle grauenhafter Mutationen alle betroffenen Lebewesen in den Wahnsinn und der Planet verliert dadurch mehrere Siedlungen und Agri-Komplexe.
languages.original_text: Lady Vyatt performs a great ritual, and the new harvest surpasses all expectations. Meanwhile, a sudden wave of horrific mutations robs all afflicted living things of sanity, and the planet loses several settlements and agri-complexes as a result.

traits.locale_text: Lady Vyatt führt ein großes Ritual durch, und die neue Ernte übertrifft alle Erwartungen. Währenddessen treibt eine Welle grauenhafter Mutationen alle betroffenen Lebewesen in den Wahnsinn und der Planet verliert dadurch mehrere Siedlungen und Agri-Komplexe.

languages.text: Leydi Vyatt büyük bir ayin gerçekleştiriyor ve yeni hasat tüm beklentileri aşıyor. Bu esnada ani ve korkunç bir mutasyon dalgası, musallat olduğu her canlının aklını çalıyor ve gezegen sonuç olarak birkaç yerleşim yerini ve tarım kompleksini kaybediyor.
languages.original_text: Lady Vyatt performs a great ritual, and the new harvest surpasses all expectations. Meanwhile, a sudden wave of horrific mutations robs all afflicted living things of sanity, and the planet loses several settlements and agri-complexes as a result.
